Reviews.Content: that is paradise!!! i was hesitate in mimpi, at that timemimpi not famous in korean but i was read an short in reviewwritten that paradise is mimpi thus i was decide to mimpi friendly step(sales manager Astwa and etc), very delicious food, fresh air, wide and beautiful garden, sunset in seaside, funny ship, fantastic snorkling, more best hot springi come true sliky skin (sadly only in mimpi ^^;) i plan to again to mimpi for my honeyi do love mimpi really i have a little worry that mimpi 's rates higherbut mimpi is the best good resort for relax
Reviews.Author: astrall

Reviews.Content: Very nice resort to relax Clean room, friendly staff and beautiful surrounding/landscaping. - very very nice landscaping.the room has patio with buildin sofa and outdoor bathroom, very unique and nice setting. The food is not bad, and the only restaurant in the hotel and no other restaurants close by. Hotel has several pools and places for you to relax in quite surrounding. Dive facility on premises, 35 -40 minutes boat ride to Menjangan island marine park. Suggestion, stay here during summer season and not rainy season. Hotel situated on bay close by to natural mangroves, in June, July and August there is a constant breeze which keep it nice and cool and keep the mosquitos away! We have no problems with mosqitos during our stay.The hotel is about 4 plus hours drive from Denpasar area and no airport close by.wsb
Reviews.Author: wsben

Reviews.Content: Nice Place - but..... We stayed 5 nights in a small but nice cottage, with own small courtyard, a second small place that features a tub with hot spring water (with a distinct smell of Methane - it's volcanic water)and a typical outside balinese style bathroom.The room was nice, the bathroom also, but it shows that the hotel owner seems to have no money left for renovations. The wood was tarnished and looked shabby.Sevice at the rstaurant was slow and not really outgoing. It was sometimes a bit difficult to communicate as the staff's comand of english was rather poor.Pool is really great and the general setting too. 3 seperate small hot pools outside feature again the hot spring water that is pumped from the ground. It smells like boiled eggs, but it is hot and relaxing.No beach as the hotel is set back from the coast, with a waterway out to the sea. Surrounded by mangroves. Looks nice.In general a nice place, but it urgently needs a good refinishing job.Disturbing is in the early morning the arrival of the staff on their Mopeds - it wakes the whole place - especially when they run up their motor.For the rate you'll find better in Bali - and then with a beach in front too.Still our stay was ok as we moved around a lot and stayed rather little on the hotel grounds.It is far away from just about everything on Bali.
Reviews.Author: Indolover
